textTemplates.name: tplCmpEmailBody_Intro
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for supporting Collective Chicago as we disrupt homelessness with dignity.

Your donation went towards our mission of disrupting cycles of poverty with dignified transitional housing that holistically connects young men to opportunities that create and sustain personal, professional, and relational growth.

{!get_Settings.generalEmail__c} {!$Organization.Name}
{!$Organization.Phone} {!$Organization.Street}
{!$Organization.City}, {!$Organization.State} {!$Organization.PostalCode}
EIN: {!get_Settings.employerIdentificationNumber__c} {!get_Settings.generalWebsite__c}

textTemplates.name: tplCmpEmailFooterDisclaimer
textTemplates.text: Collective Chicago is a 501(c)(3) organization and gifts are tax-deductible as allowed by law. Our taxpayer identification number is {!get_Settings.employerIdentificationNumber__c}. No goods or services have been exchanged for these donations. Please retain this letter as a record of your contribution for tax purposes.

The Collective Team
